reviews.author: Mary Joy Parks
reviews.review: I've lived here for almost 8 yrs with my sweet kitty. We love it here as, there's a washer and dryer inside of my apartment. The apartments are big and it's peaceful&quite here and close to lots of shopping stores!

reviews.author: Monica Wood
reviews.review: Great place to live (if you're lucky enough to get in). On the bus line. Close to amenities and some places within walking distance.

reviews.author: Amaya Lopez
reviews.review:
Best apt. EVER I live there its sooo nice!!
